meanings.definition: Resembling a sheet in form or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The blanket was sheetlike, covering the entire bed smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The paper was sheetlike, lying flat on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The ghost costume was sheetlike, making the child look like a floating specter.
meanings.sent4: The fog was sheetlike, enveloping the town in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The snow was sheetlike, blanketing the ground in a pristine white layer.

meanings.definition: Extending or spreading in a thin, flat layer.
meanings.sent1: The icing on the cake was sheetlike, perfectly smooth and even.
meanings.sent2: The algae formed a sheetlike layer on the surface of the pond.
meanings.sent3: The pancake was sheetlike, covering the plate in a delicious golden layer.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtered through the window in a sheetlike pattern.
meanings.sent5: The paint was applied in a sheetlike manner, creating a seamless finish.
